1. vscode 插件商城安装 koroFileHeader


2. vscode 首选项中搜索 fileHeader 在setting.json 中配置
 "fileheader.customMade": {
        "Author": "pengqiang",
        "Date": "Do not edit",
        "LastEditors": "pengqiang",
        "LastEditTime": "Do not edit",
        "Description": "file content"
    }

3. vscode 中使用快捷键 
自定义注释头部
windoiw: ctrl+alt+i
mac: ctrl+cmd+i

自定义函数注释
window: ctrl+alt+t
mac: ctrl+cmd+t
